Kashira:
Tsume (つめ)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

The Love of Ohan and Choemon (Katsuragawa renri no shigarami / 桂川連理柵)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Shiraishi Story (Go taiheiki shiraishi banashi / 碁太平記白石噺)

The Woman-Killer and the Hell of Oil (Onnakoroshi abura no jigoku / 女殺油地獄)

The Courier for Hell (Meido no hikyaku / 冥途の飛脚)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu (Shinpan utazaimon / 新版歌祭文)

The Young Cherry Tree (Hiyoshimaru wakaki no sakura / 日吉丸稚桜)

Kagekiyo and His Daughter (Musume Kagekiyo Yashima nikki / 嬢景清八嶋日記)

The Story of Priest Roben (Rōbensugi no yurai / 良弁杉由来)

The Love Suicide of Hambei and Ochiyo (Shinjū Yoigōshin / 心中宵庚申)

The Vendetta in Iga (Iga-goe dōchū sugoroku / 伊賀越道中双六)

The Vendetta by a Samurai in Rags (Katakiuchi tsuzure no nishiki / 敵討襤褸錦敵討襤褸錦)

The Battle of Coxinga (Kokusen'ya kassen / 国性爺合戦)

The Priest in Exile (Heike nyōgo no shima / 平家女護島)

The Story of the Morning Glory (Shōutsushi asagao banashi / 生写朝顔話)

The League of the 47 Ronin (Kanadehon Chūshingura / 仮名手本忠臣蔵)

The New Usuyuki Story (Shin usuyuki monogatari / 新薄雪物語)
